ResourceHeader.ResourceName: The Heliophysics Application Programmer's Interface Specification 3.0.0
ResourceHeader.Description:
This specification describes a data delivery standard for time series data.
      It is used within the Heliophysics community, but is generic in that it offers a very simple interface for serving data, 
      similar to what many providers are already using. This version of the specification has a few changes from
      the previous version - see the update list at the beginning.  There are various Github projects providing software
      implementing server and client elements that use the standard.nents of such
      a data delivery system. This includes repositories, registries and services.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Weigel, Robert, Vandegriff, Jon, Faden, Jeremy, Roberts, D. Aaron, King, Todd, Candey, Robert, Harris, Bernard.
